column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Jinora says : " So , how 's it going with the tall , dreamy firebender boy ?
#Text=Tell us all about the magical romance .
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=Listen to you two , I - I 'm not interested in Mako or any romantic stuff .
#Text=Besides he 's all into that prissy , beautiful , elegant , rich girl ... but let 's just pretend for a second I am interested in him .
#Text=What would I do ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Ooh !
#Text=I just read a historical saga where the heroine fell in love with the enemy general 's son , who 's supposed to marry the princess .
#Text=You should do what she did !
#Text=" Korra says : " Tell me !
#Text=" Jinora says : " She rode a dragon into battle and burned down the entire country .
#Text=Then she jumped into a volcano .
#Text=It was so romantic !
#Text=" Korra says : " Uhh ... " Ikki says : " No , no , no !

#Text=The best way to win a boy 's heart is to brew a love potion of rainbows and sunsets that makes true lovers sprout wings and fly into a magical castle in the sky , where they get married and eat clouds with spoons and use stars as ice cubes in their moonlight punch .
#Text=Forever and ever and ever !
#Text=" Korra says : " The volcano is starting to make more sense to me now .
#Text=" Korra says : " Oh , hey Pema .
#Text=Uh , how long were you standing there ?
#Text=" Pema says : " Long enough .
#Text=But trust me , I know what you 're going through .
#Text=Years ago I was in the exact the same situation , with Tenzin .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Daddy was in love with someone else before you ?
#Text=" Pema says : " That 's right .
#Text=" Korra says : " So what did you do ?
#Text=" Pema says : " Well , for the longest time , I did nothing .
#Text=I was so shy and scared of rejection , but watching my soul mate spend his life with the wrong woman became too painful .
#Text=So I hung my chin out there and I confessed my love to Tenzin .
#Text=And the rest is history .
#Text=" Korra , Ikki , and Jinora says : " Wooow !
#Text="
